Table	Create Table
deployments	CREATE TABLE `deployments` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `buildPlanId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `intakeId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('queued','running','success','failed') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'queued',
  `siteId` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `previewUrl` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `productionUrl` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `logs` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `errorMessage` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `startedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `completedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `urlMode` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'TEMP_MANUS',
  `urlModeEnforcementLog` json DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=120001
